title: Current Issues and Intrigues
content:
[ul][li]A rogue scholar from the Discipline of Dust has vanished with an unknown relic from Vault-17. Rumours say the item bleeds sand and shadow.[/li][/ul]
[ul][li]The Discipline of Shadow has grown in political power, causing unease among the more traditional orders.[/li][/ul]
[ul][li]There are whispers that the Discipline of Flesh has begun grafting relics directly into their flesh.[/li][/ul]
[ul][li]An upstart scholar at the Collegium claims to have found a lost language that speaks back.[/li][/ul]
